emptyState.title: Create my first limit
emptyState.description: Define a maximum amount for expenses like Restaurants or Transportation.

modal.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this budget?

screen1.title: Smart Budgets
screen1.subtitle: Control your spending with flexible, automatically renewable budgets
screen1.feature1Description: Create weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly or custom budgets
screen1.feature2Description: Enable recurring option and forget about creating budgets every month
screen1.feature3Description: See your progress in real-time with color bars and smart alerts

screen2.title: Choose Your Period
screen2.subtitle: You're not limited to monthly budgets. Choose the period that best suits you.
screen2.example: Create a weekly budget of $ 100,000 for restaurants, or a yearly one of $ 5,000,000 for travel.

screen3.title: Set and Forget
screen3.subtitle: Enable automatic renewal and your budgets will recreate themselves when each period ends.
screen3.infoText: Budgets are automatically renewed with the same amount and period. You can disable renewal anytime.

screen4.title: Real-Time Tracking
screen4.subtitle: Visualize your progress with status bars, intuitive colors and alerts when you approach the limit.
screen4.colorsDescription: Green = good shape, Yellow = near limit, Red = exceeded. You'll always know your budget status at a glance.
